original_text: Samaria's people are guilty and they will receive their punishment. 13: Samaria was another name for the northern kingdom, Israel. It was the capital city of Israel. They have turned against their God. They will die in war. Cruel enemies will kill their young children. Soldiers will cut open their pregnant women. Samaria's people are guilty and they will receive their punishment. 13: Samaria was another name for the northern kingdom, Israel. It was the capital city of Israel. They have turned against their God. They will die in war. Cruel enemies will kill their young children. Soldiers will cut open their pregnant women. korean_text: 사마리아가 그들의 하나님을 배반하였으므로 형벌을 당하여 칼에 엎드러질 것이요 그 어린 아이는 부서뜨려지며 아이 밴 여인은 배가 갈라지리라

sentences.original_text: and they will receive their punishment
Samaria was another name for the northern kingdom, Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 사마리아는 북쪽 왕국 이스라엘의 다른 이름이었습니다

sentences.original_text: It was the capital city of Israel
They have turned against their God
Cruel enemies will kill their young children
sentences.korean_translation: 잔인한 적들이 그들의 어린 아이들을 죽일 것입니다

sentences.original_text: Soldiers will cut open their pregnant women
sentences.korean_translation: 군인들이 그들의 임산부의 배를 갈라놓을 것입니다
